attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This is trash just like him :(

attributes.title: Hm... well here’s the story
attributes.review: You see once I downloaded the app everything started to go wrong! I think it must be a bad omen or maybe this app is cursed! You see after downloading the app my dog🐶started to fly! But once I pulled her down my house was sucked into a tornado🌪 and crashed, crushing a witch🧙🏽‍♀️ with red shoes👠! And as I thought of the idea to write this I was falling down a rabbit hole because the rabbit said “he was late” ⏰ and I wanted to know what for. But once I landed I somehow ended up in a Galaxy Far Far Away🌌 with some boy telling me he was going to take me into the sky off to Never Land✨. I didn’t want to go so I went to the beach🏖 where a crab 🦀 told me being Under the Sea 🌊 was better. I told him that it probably was but I would drown if i went with him. So instead I took a ride with the Guardians of the Galaxy⚔️ and they dropped me off in some place called Diagon Alley were there are lots of wizards 🧙‍♂️ so that’s what happens and why I the app is a bad omen 💀

attributes.title: Chile anyways stream be happy😻😼😽

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I came on here to keep of with COVID and the riots since I don’t have a tv to watch news on, and I got to say this app is a disappointment. It took almost all of my space on my phone. Took a long time downloading. And when I FINALLY got on the app it started glitching.  Wouldn’t let me clicked on things and took an even longer time for things to load. This app is HORRIBLE!!

attributes.title: Garbage app for a garbage president
attributes.review: Poorly designed, but that's to be expected based on the incompetence of anybody who works for him.

attributes.title: have🤬you😛ever👺been🦡snaked🐍by👸🏼a🧠friend👁then😤just🤚🏽for😖clout👹theyll🥰do it😄again🤥
attributes.review: I am 37 years old ❤️and I downloaded this app for my kids to play on and learn some more about our president🇺🇸 and I was shocked😵. After a little bit of them being on it they were being sexist👩‍❤️‍👨 and racist to eachother. They were calling eachother the N WORD👄. I am not ok with this😾, so this is just one reason I’m rating this app a 1, if I could I would give it a 0. Another reason is because after that I heard a sound at night when all the kids were asleep😴, it was a baby laughing😼 and little kids saying “mommy we’re coming👹” I looked and MY LITTLE KIDS WERE POSSESSED!😈 they had a knife 🔪 and were coming at me with it, with the debby ryan smerk on their face👁👄👁. I was beyond terrified😣 then I looked out the window and my husband was cheating on me with trumps wife😳haha jokes on you trump🥵I never even liked my husband anyways😐so this is why you should not get this app

attributes.title: Oop
attributes.review: This app did nothing!!! I tried downloading it and it didn’t even download!!! What kinda app is that. Just about as good as the people it supports it seems to me. Very disappointed. 0 stars. I am disgusted and I wish I could give a lesser review
